td.content: s:pt with C/O moderate nausea for 2 weeks that is frequent. pt also reports moderate abdominal pain. he is a M aged 67 Ys. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, eyes = dilated pupil, Abdomen = non tender, non distended, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prochlorperazine - 25 mg daily (rectal dose), and ordered Canalith-Repositioning Maneuvers - semicircular canals.
